subject: need tips for accessing Orkut with ELinks
body:
Hi,

I'm a beginner with ELinks. Currently I'm trying to access and log in to 
Orkut,
www.orkut.com

At the first page, I cannot find the form fields to put my e-mail and 
password.

I have succeeded accessing Orkut with Edbrowse web browser. Using Edbrowse, 
I discovered that to enable the form fields, I must access a link called 
"login" that's in a frame, but in ELinks I don't know what keys to press to 
land in frames, form fields, etc.

Thanks,
Cleverson

"Be realistic; ask for the impossible."
